entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
